text: Zakerana nilagirica (Nilgiris wart frog or Nilgiri frog) is a species of frog that is endemic to the Western Ghats, India. It is known from Nilgiri mountains in Tamil Nadu and Wayanad district in Karnataka. It is known with certainty only from the two aforementioned localities, but it is locally common. It is associated with stagnant and running waters in disturbed forests and cultivated areas adjacent to forests. ==References== ==External links== nilagirica Category:Frogs of India Category:Endemic fauna of the Western Ghats Category:Amphibians described in 1854
title: Zakerana nilagirica
